basics.summary: I am a software engineer with strong technical leadership and management experience. I believe my main strength is the ability to align engineering practices with the organizational goals. Over the past few years, I have been spending time in my time in javascript, but in this position in a variety of, I decided to learn new things and I enjoy to stay constantly tinkering with different ways to expand my knowledge and improve existing work in order to deliver good quality products.
